attributes.action: Treat Brexit result as advisory as poll now suggests it is invalid-no2brexit.com
attributes.additional_details: The material, links, references etc. are covered in www.no2brexit.com.
attributes.background: Post BREXIT polls now show the result now would be different. The vote was undemocratic:Commonwealth but not EU UK residents voting. The Leave campaign was riddled with lies. We seek a free-vote commons debate which either triggers Art.50 or reruns a fairer, honest & more democratic referendum.
